body:
[AN IMPORTANT MESSAGE]

We are currently experiencing some issues with the Skype and Mojang accounts of a couple of staff. If you receive any messages from Avicus staff requesting you to click a link and log in with your Minecraft details, we stongly advise that you DO NOT do so. The link resembles a report thread from another network. If you have already clicked on these links please change your Skype and Minecraft passwords as soon as possible.

The staff members that were involved have been banned and had their ranks have removed for now as a safety precaution. Do not worry, they will be back soon.


Thanks for your concern,

- Avicus Staff Team

title: [IMPORTANT] Compromised Accounts
